title: Please rework champions that actually need it
body:
Rework old champions that have outdated abilities and can't survive in the current meta.

You're reworking champions like  {{champion:84}}  and {{champion:39}} who already had somewhat viable kits with dashes and non-outdated abilities 

Here are a few champions that need and deserve a rework.

{{champion:106}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:43}} 

Hopefully at least 1 or 2 of these champs get a rework in the next few months
